snippet: The presumptive Republican presidential candidate, reviving recent controversies in his campaign, also reaffirmed his praise of Saddam Hussein....
abstract: Donald J Trump defiantly defends his campaign's decision to publish image of six-pointed star on campaign material despite fact that it is widely viewed as anti-Semitic; says he regrets having deleted image from his Twitter account.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN, MICHAEL BARBARO and JONATHAN MAHLER
byline.contributor: Alexander Burns and Patrick Healy contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The presumptive Republican presidential candidate, reviving recent controversies in his campaign, also reaffirmed his praise of Saddam Hussein.

headline.main: In a Defiant, Angry Speech, Donald Trump Defends Image Seen as Anti-Semitic
headline.print_headline: In Defiant, Angry Speech, Trump Defends a Post Seen as Anti-Semitic
